certificates.title: Object-Oriented Design by University of Alberta
certificates.author: University of Alberta
certificates.description: This course takes Java beginners to the next level by covering object-oriented analysis and design. You will discover how to create modular, flexible, and reusable software, by applying object-oriented design principles and guidelines. And, you will be able to communicate these designs in a visual notation known as Unified Modelling Language (UML).

certificates.title: JavaScript Security Specialization
certificates.author: Vladimir de Turckheim
certificates.description: In this Specialization, we will investigate, prevent, and resolve JavaScript-related attacks and learn how to build safer JavaScript applications. JavaScript is a fundamental technology for building web applications and is also popular for building server-side, desktop, and even mobile applications. Most of this learning Specialization will cover front-end JavaScript; however, we will also consider Node.js.  After completing this Specialization, you will understand the diverse threats and protections of the JavaScript world

certificates.title: Version Control
certificates.author: Meta
certificates.description: Learn how modern software developers collaborate across the world without messing up each other's code. You will look at the different version control systems and how to create an effective software development workflow. You will be introduced to some of the most commonly used Linux commands that you can use to work with files on your hard drive and create powerful workflows that will automate your work, saving you time and effort.

certificates.title: Programming with JavaScript
certificates.author: Meta
certificates.description: JavaScript is the programming language that powers the modern web. In this course, you will learn the basic concepts of web development with JavaScript. You will work with functions, objects, arrays, variables, data types, the HTML DOM, and much more. You will learn how to use JavaScript and discover interactive possibilities with modern JavaScript technologies. Finally, you will learn about the practice of testing code and how to write a unit test using Jest.

certificates.title: Introduction to Front-End Development
certificates.author: Meta
certificates.description: This course is part of the Meta Front-End Developer Professional Certificate. When you enroll in this course, you'll also be enrolled in this Professional Certificate. Learn new concepts from industry experts : Gain a foundational understanding of a subject or tool, Develop job-relevant skills with hands-on projects,Earn a shareable career certificate from Meta
